lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute my bit, no matter how small, to help the world's poor.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: micro finance encourages small business growth thereby empowering them to help their community.

lender.name: Pierce
lender.loan_because: I encourage people to be self-sufficient and I realize that sometimes they just need a little help. Each dollar that I lend will be multiplied many times over when the entreprenuer's business becomes sustainable, and when I get it back I can loan it to the next entrepreneur.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their dream come true, and Kiva embodies the true spirit of an accessible global economy.
lender.occupational_info: I make electric guitars, jewelry, artistic sculpture, and websites. I am also a student at an American University.

lender.name: Good Luck!
lender.loan_because: Good Luck!
lender.occupational_info: weejakers.com

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I feel everyone who works hard and is trying to better themselves should have a way to obtain what they need, and I feel fortunate to have enough to lend to others in hope that I can make their lives better and help them build their dream(s)
lender.occupational_info: I am an analyst at one of the largest Insurance Companies in the United States, I gather data for the company and send it to various states, and organizations who request it. I reside in one of the most beautiful cities in the USA, Seattle, Washington.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs deserve a chance to succeed no matter where they live.
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes, land, and businesses to and for people in my community.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:40 "The King will reply, 'Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me.'

lender.name: Kari
lender.loan_because: People who have resources should share with those who don't.
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofits use the internet and web in order to be more effective in doing their jobs.

lender.name: Amy
lender.occupation: I work with emerging genome sequencing technology.
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the people of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with DNA sequencing technology to help understand how medicine affects individuals.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I acknowledge that a million small sacrifices can make one world of a difference.

lender.name: Mathew
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help make the internet work, and hopefully help others.

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: I believe that people can change their lives when given the opportunity. Microfinancing is this kind of an oppourtunity. It costs me so little, but can do so much good.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Political Science senior. I also work as a waitress.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: Investments of love, time, labor and money (given in that order) work.
lender.occupational_info:
I believe I can invest a $15,000 "nest-egg" in the futures market and obtain a return of about $3000 a month. I believe I can double the nest-egg in a year and likewise double the return.
Is it risky? Yes. I could easily loose it all in a month.
Why am I doing this? (1) I retired early with not quite enough savings to see me through -- I'm short about $2000 a month. (2) I spent my life (all 62 years of it) wasting time. I do not want to have on my tombstone the inscription "Here lies a man who did nothing -- God is NOT pleased". (3) So before the sun sets on my life I make a difference in the lives of others by investing in those charities that feed to world's hungry and care for the world's needy. (4) So I will devote to these charities all the investment earnings not needed to support my modest lifestyle (5) This is 99% about spiritual improvement and 1% about making money.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: "Say NO to terrorism. Start a business!"
lender.occupational_info: I am a Deputy Sheriff for a small mountain community,as well as, a Soldier for the United States Army National Guard. I have served in Iraq and Afghanistan. I like to hike outdoors and I enjoy Beer in the city with friends.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that I can help someone while allowing them to maintain their own independence and sense of self-worth. I like the idea that I might be assisting someone to make a step forward for themselves and their community...
lender.occupational_info: I help my company to manage the long and short term risks of undertaking its principal business activities.

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: I want to help people from around the world, especially the ones that really need!
lender.occupational_info: My main activity is the detailing and calculation of civil engineering structures (armed concrete and steel)

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: we are lucky enough to have opportunities to create our own wealth and we want to share
lender.occupational_info: Our No Tall Poppies network was created to provide an opportunity for nurturing; support; achievement without glory; on-going renewal; Have a closer look at a field of poppies. We love the way they grow in a group. Some heads slightly bowed; some faces lifting to the sun – and, just occasionally one or two taller poppies. If you are a tall poppy, or not, you will find many friends at Kiva.

lender.name: Geurt en Wennie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Nano
lender.occupation: Arts cafe perpetrator, artist, face painter

lender.occupational_info: Technical, support, and managerial duties for specialized materials

lender.name: Els
lender.loan_because: You do something I can believe in.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to 11 to 15 year old boys and girls.

lender.name: aaron
lender.loan_because: Ты есть - ия уж не ничто!
lender.occupational_info: reading!

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: Many times in my life I have been helped by the kindness and generosity of strangers. I am now in a position to give some of that help back to others who are striving for a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are sad, depressed or afraid to feel better and live happier, healthier lives.

lender.name: Egil
lender.loan_because: Was directed to Kiva by a person I respect. After a brief look I registered as lender. I liked the KIVA model very much and believe that being a KIVA lender is a very good way to able people around the world to strive for their dreams and be able to "make their own lifes" even if it means hard work. I highly respect people that are willing to make hard efforts to provide for themselves, eventhough the conditions they are living in are very difficult.
lender.occupational_info: Working with sales of wood products, used by industries and private people for building projects. Using wood for building purposes is also very good for the environment. Trees are collecting CO2 when the grow.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe that today will someday be tomorrow and if all of the pieces of today fall into place for someone, then tomorrow will be a better today.
lender.occupational_info: I am the coordinator of a project studying the political status of ethnic groups worldwide.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.occupation: Account Manager for a transportation logistics co.
lender.loan_because: Every little bit can make a big difference to someone. I had the opportunity to live in South America for some time and saw firsthand how others live on much less than I do. I respect the entrereneurs on this site, and I'd like to be a part of supporting their businesses. I like connecting with others, and I think this is such an awesome idea.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic way to help people help themselves. Also in memory of my father who I miss very much.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I want to help people up instead of telling them to pull themselves up by their own boostraps

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who have the courage to help themselves. I also wish to be an example in reminding others that one doesn't need to belong to a religious group to help those who are in need.
lender.occupational_info: Although I enjoy giving aide to all types of entrepreneurs, I am especially passionate about the environment and education.

lender.name: DJ G.
lender.loan_because: I want to show that young people can make a difference also.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, but I try to truly educate myself in other ways

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can.....maybe not much, but I can.

lender.occupational_info: I am in the online social network space. As such, I help clients get found on Google by others who sahre the same interests and passion.

lender.occupational_info: My friend gave me this locksmith company and "taught me to fish". I provide services to corporate customers such as picking, re-keying or installing locks and other security devices.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I want to help make life a little better for someone else.

lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor of Family Medicine. I work with people of all ages who need health care.

lender.occupational_info: i am about to 26 years. having degrees MSc (Physiology), B.Ed from university of sindh , jamshoro, Pakistan

lender.occupational_info: selling houses and finance to buy houses. Helping clients protect themselves against lifes accidents and illnesses.

lender.occupational_info: I am a Peace Corps Volunteer in Romania. I live in a village and teach English to Romanian students. I am just getting started so I am sure much more is to come.

lender.occupational_info: I make sure the computers Keep running and the lights keep blinking.

lender.occupational_info: Fun and quick to learn too.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone, everywhere should be given the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I'm going back to school at night, but I work full-time as a scientist, validating the standards that people all around the world use to ensure that the roads they drive on, the food they eat, and the products they buy have all been made to some known level of safety or quality.

lender.name: Kentaro
lender.loan_because: The results are amazing.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy writing music and developing websites.

lender.occupational_info: I build consumer electronic widgets and sell them to people who have much, then I can lend and give to those who don't have as much.

lender.name: Brendal

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the reduction of poverty only through the creation of wealth. I believe wealth is created through work, innovation, and the useful deployment of capital. Some people lack the capital to deploy and I have empathy with them.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: This was a Christmas gift from my Uncle Danny. This was fun. Thanks Uncle Danny.

lender.name: Sarah

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: I think this a wonderful way of helping others and hope that I can help more.
lender.occupational_info: I was injured at work and can no longer work outside the home. So I now stay at home with two of my four children (the eldest two live away) I am also looking into fostering children as i used to own a child-care facility and love children.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: Opportunity can change a person. A person can change a community. A community can change a country and a country can change the world.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I have been given much in my life, and I want to share all that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I organize, research, and plan exhibitions about Asian art.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower people to feel free from financial burdens.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for a law firm to put together environmental compliance programs for chemical and pesticide companies.
More importantly, I am a mother of two boys ages 13 and 5. This is what I enjoy most and hope to teach them the importance of being citizens of the world.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I draw comics about growing up in that threshold of adulthood, as well as a journal comic about silly things that happen day-to-day. I also design shirts, 1" badges, and assorted merchandise.

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I like to support others to be able to advantage of opportunities in their lives. I like reading their stories and knowing that the money I lend has a direct impact on their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My family has a wholesale business. We sell many types of products to stores in US.

lender.name: Maxwell
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people that are less fortunate then I am, and I would like to help out the people that work very hard just to make ends meet.

I like being a citizen of the world.

lender.name: Ken Jarvis
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Well...,you know how some people just have a hard time sleeping? I teach people to sleep when they want to, without having to resort to drugs.

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of another.
lender.occupational_info: Manage a retail store

lender.occupational_info: I work at a school that trains people to work in doctor and dentist's offices. I like my job because we don't turn anyone away and most of our students go on to good jobs.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I can, and should.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: alean
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer as often as I am needed. I make warm hats and shawls for people who need them.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do. I was out of work for 10 months, but I was fortunate enough that I was eligible to collect unemployment insurance. If I didn't share my good fortune, I'd have felt even worse about it than I did. Any chance to legitimately make a change for the better in someone's life is an opportunity worth seizing.

lender.name: Liam
lender.loan_because: I am happy when I can sit down and do something for someone else that will empower them.

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.occupational_info: I fix Computers

I want to help people that have ambitions but have difficulties to realize them.

lender.occupational_info: Drawing computer graphics and running my company.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I grew my business with a loan from a very trusting man. I was a run-of-the-mill carpenter. I knew how to fix houses, and I had a lot of desire. But I had no collateral. No business business plan. My traditional "credit" was shaky. I was fortunate to have met a man who gave me my first loan to buy an investment property. I've been riding the rewards of that loan for ten years now. This is my modest way of giving back to people who need a financial door opened for them so they can live up to their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase, renovate and re-sell houses in Baltimore City. I only work in neighborhoods which are middle class. Providing modernized, attractive homes in working class neighborhoods.

lender.name: Saran
lender.loan_because: microfinance is cool and it's good karma

lender.name: Achoh
lender.loan_because: If am into Arts anfd culture. I need a loan to complete my first comedy production so as to put in the market. I have shot a movie but can't realise it because of lack of capital. I need to help others too especially my actors and others in the world whom i will touch as soon as i succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Well I like my Job because it is my Talents though it is stressful since i can't realise them smoothly due to lack of support.

lender.name: The Entrepreneurs Club
lender.loan_because: We empower others that the can become successful. Money should not be the reason in which you DO NOT take action on a business venture, but it seems to be the most common reason. In countries that need capital and would benefit greatly from our loans, we want to help out.
lender.occupational_info: The Entrepreneurs Club is an organization at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. Our mantra is "Entrepreneurial Empowerment." We want to empower not only this community but the world that they can change the world through entrepreneurship. Whether its networking with mentors, guest lecturers, workshops, community projects and challenges, we provide the necessary tools needed to prepare yourself for the real world.

lender.loan_because: I have been to many places in the world where people were in need of help. Kiva lets me help!

lender.loan_because: I think it is very necessary. If all the people who has the possibility donates a minimal amount, things in the world wil be a lot better.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: Because I feel it is a great way to help people from long-term poverty. I like the idea that it's not about charity. I'm not giving away money, I trust these people to come up with a plan to be able to pay me back. It's my experience that people grow with responsibility and trust.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: To help you make a difference in your community.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It is one small way to make a big difference in the life of another person. My loan provides tremendous leverage that otherwise might not exist. Mostly, I loan because it makes me feel good!
lender.occupational_info: Human services - non-profit agency helping make the lives of people with disabilities better. Creating opportunities for others to have a good life. My work is so rewarding and another example of "leverage." I develop the skills and abilities of some amazing staff! I work with some great people, and I am thankful!

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with the means to help so I do.

lender.name: adrian
lender.loan_because: good fortune should be shared, and there is much that needs doing.

lender.name: WilliamdeLaney
lender.loan_because: I want to be a river, not a reservoir. I give back 10% of what I earn and receive from others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm partial to anyone standing near a cow

lender.name: afreedawg
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment more than charity
lender.occupational_info: I fly planes

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. If I can help just one person in my life, then I know my time here wasn't wasted.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase, rent and sell residential properties.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I believe each of us has the power to change the world. One tiny bit at a time. I want my kids to understand that sometimes the smallest things make the biggest difference.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I own a business and want to see others have the same opportunity. My father was a farmer and owned a small grocery store - this is where I learned the value of owning a business.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies communicate about themselves to their employees, clients and vendors by producing videos and other media that tell their story.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: i believe in paying it forward
lender.occupational_info: I used ultrasound machines to look at peoples circulation to see if they are healthy

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: My money makes a bigger difference in the borrowers' hands. Loan obligations ensure there is a motive to put the capital to good use.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an overeducated typist.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: That's a great question, isn't it. If my reasons were simple this answer would be easy. I have been blessed to live in the wealthiest nation on earth. Blessed is the key word, but that blessing means nothing if I ignore the increased responsibility to my fellow man that comes with it. Loaning is part of what I feel my role in the world is. From donating to Doctor's Without Borders, Habitat for Humanity, etc. Kiva loans fit right into living up to and being worthy of those blessings.

lender.name: BILL
lender.occupational_info: construction

lender.name: Melonie
lender.loan_because: I can and everyone who can, should.
lender.occupational_info: I fundraise for a non-profit based in Costa Rica. I make colorful documents, talk on the phone and update things on the internet.

lender.name: Leonel
lender.loan_because: Because there are others who could use a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist.

lender.name: Stephannie
lender.loan_because: i love helping people
lender.occupational_info: I care for the elderly in their homes cleaning, cooking, help with personal care i also take them out grocery shopping and to the doctors office

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: You build character and courage by encouraging initiative and independence. This is the building material for a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I look for that which is overlooked yet holds great value.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I help people reach their potential.

lender.name: jim
lender.loan_because: I think everyone should have the means to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work a few hours Selling electronics, while attending college full time.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves an opportunity to make a living. I admire the people who are trying to open a business.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large company and my team teaches our customers how to use the equipment we sell

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: it's important that everyone is able to work and contribute what they can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer -- I help people understand.
